bug.author: zmqp111
bug.summary: Loading saved model causes Unknown layer: Normalization
bug.description:
I try to saved best model, and load. but i have Loading saved model causes Unknown layer: Normalization error autokeras : 1.0.2 tf : 2.1.0
i cannot upgrade autokeras version, because autokeras 1.0.3's accuracy is not good.

comments.comment: You can pass the normalization layer as a custom object while you load the model. Would you please provide your dataset? So that we can tune our algorithm to see why it doesn't perform good. Thanks.
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.
